dataflowSinks.name: UserQueryOutput
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UserQueryOutput

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employee
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		dname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Department
Employee aggregate(groupBy(department),
	EmployeeByDept = count(empid),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Aggregate
Employee, Department join(department == deptid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Aggregate, Department join(department == deptid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['EmpAndDept.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Column_1 = empid,
		Column_2 = name,
		Column_3 = country,
		Column_4 = dname
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> EDJoin
Join2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['GroupEmpByDept.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employee
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		dname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Department
Employee split(equals(department,'1'),
	equals(department,'2'),
	equals(department,'3'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit@(ITEmployee, HREmployee, PayrollEmployee)
ConditionalSplit@ITEmployee, Department join(department == deptid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinForIT
ConditionalSplit@HREmployee, Department join(department == deptid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinForHR
ConditionalSplit@PayrollEmployee, Department join(department == deptid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinForPayroll
JoinForIT sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['ITEmp.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		empid,
		name,
		country,
		dname
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> IT
JoinForHR sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['HREmp.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		empid,
		name,
		country,
		dname
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> HR
JoinForPayroll sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['PayrollEmp.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		empid,
		name,
		country,
		dname
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Payroll

source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(country = upper(country),
		UpdatedCountry = iif(isNull(country), 'UNKNOWN', upper(country))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['ModifiedData.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AddedColumns

source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		dname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 join(department == deptid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['kchbhi'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		empid,
		name,
		country,
		dname
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employeee
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		dname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Department
Employeee, Department exists(department == deptid,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['ExistingDept'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ExistingDept

parameters{
	DeptName as string ("IT")
}
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		gender as string,
		country as string,
		department as string,
		salary as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(department == $DeptName) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['FilterByDept.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(equals(department,'3')) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['PayrollEmp'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PayrollEmpData

source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employee
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		dname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Department
Employee, Department lookup(department == deptid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup
Lookup sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['Lookup.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> LookUpResult

source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		gender as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employee
Employee pivot(groupBy(department),
	pivotBy(gender),
	{} = count(empid),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['PivotResult.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employee
Employee sort(asc(name, true),
	caseInsensitive: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Sort
Sort sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['SortByName.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SortResult

source(output(
		Name as string,
		Age as string,
		City as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Student
Student keyGenerate(output(StudentID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 select(mapColumn(
		StudentID,
		Name,
		Age,
		City
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['Student.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employee
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		dname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Department
Employee aggregate(groupBy(department),
	TotalEmployee = count(empid)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1, Department join(department == deptid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['TotalEmpByDept'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		TotalEmployee,
		dname
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		PO as string,
		Vendor as string,
		Apple as string,
		Mango as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Fruits
Fruits unpivot(output(
		Fruits as string,
		Amount as string
	),
	ungroupBy(PO,
		Vendor),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
Unpivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['UnPivot.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		empid as integer,
		name as string,
		gender as string,
		country as string,
		department as string,
		salary as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employees
Employees window(over(department),
	asc(salary, true),
	AvgSalary = avg(salary)) ~> Window1
Window1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['WindowTrans.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WindowTrans

sources.name: EmployeeData
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmployeeData

sources.name: DepartmentData
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DepartmentData

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared EmployeeData = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://ambujstorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/adfdemo/input/Emp.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared DepartmentData = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://ambujstorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/adfdemo/input/Dept.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = EmployeeData,
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(Source, {"country"}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Removed columns", each [department] = "2"),
  #"Merged queries" = Table.NestedJoin(#"Filtered rows", {"department"}, DepartmentData, {"deptid"}, "DepartmentData", JoinKind.Inner),
  #"Expanded DepartmentData" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Merged queries", "DepartmentData", {"deptid", "dname"}, {"DepartmentData.deptid", "DepartmentData.dname"}),
  #"Removed columns 1" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Expanded DepartmentData", {"DepartmentData.deptid"})
in
  #"Removed columns 1";
